title: SOCW 245
names: Doing Good through the Nonprofit Sector
intro: Study of the nonprofit sector theory, activity and structures in the US and abroad. Challenges students to think critically about the role and value of the nonprofit/voluntary sector in society, to understand ethical principles and values that guide nonprofit work, and to assess research evidence about effectiveness and impact. Helps inform students' thinking about future career choices and/or volunteer activities in the "third sector".
